Text: O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ gugu alumeji abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n le̩, ku ma nʼeju ku ma gane̩, ma la gane̩ n, ku ma nʼeti ku ma gbo̩la, ma la gbo̩ n; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
Todule̩, uwe̩ o̩ma one̩, kpʼane̩ ma tod eño̩, tak e̩ ño̩ o̩ro̩ka gbaa eju-ma. Uwe̩ ki la ño̩ kwʼe̩gu-we̩ tʼugbo omune̩ eju-ma; ikani ma jʼakpibe̩, dagba ma chaka chʼabo unyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼane̩-we̩ dufu eju-ma o̩ro̩ka, ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ ku ma año̩ nyʼugbo omune̩; tak uwe̩ onugo ki le dufu eju-ma e̩gba ane̩, dab e̩gba ku ma kʼamone̩ nyʼef amu ane̩ omune̩.
Fʼo̩do̩ gwa gudu eju-ma, kʼe̩ kʼane̩-we̩ lʼo̩mo̩ dufu.
Eju-ma uwe̩ ako nʼika-we̩, kʼe̩ la ko dufu e̩gba kʼane̩ achubi; uwe̩ ki kʼe̩wñ bʼeju-we̩ ma, kʼeju-we̩ ki we eli ane̩: todu omi mʼuwe̩ du chʼujiwe te̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l.
Oñ u fʼalu ku ma ñwa ñwu mi le̩ che; u mʼane̩-mi ko dufu o̩ro̩ka, dabe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ eño̩; tak e̩gba ane̩ u nʼo̩we̩-mi gwa gu o̩do̩ du; u mʼu ko dufu e̩gba kʼane̩ chubi, oñ u mʼu ko nʼika alo eju-ma.
Odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ e̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abo unyi Israe̩l-i, unyi abo ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, ka ñw e̩ kakini, Ab e̩ che-i n?
E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Adu-i chʼe-idachi kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l du ku ma jʼefu ma le̩.
Uwe̩ ki kakini, Omi chʼujiwe ñwu me̩; alu kʼomi che le̩, alu le̩ ma ñʼache ma ge̩; oñ ma alo tʼojane̩ ononojo, ma anyʼef amu.
Idachi kʼi dʼef uma le̩ la anʼadu ika-wñ e̩gba kʼane̩ chubi, oñ i alo dufu; ama agwa gu o̩do̩ du ku ma kʼane̩ lʼo̩mo̩ dufu; i ako e̩wñ bʼeju ma, todabu kʼi ma ñʼanʼeju-wñ li ane̩ n.
Omi ñʼafʼiga-mi nadala abʼo ma ge̩. Oku-mi la amʼu; oñ omi adʼowñ wa Babilo̩n, ane̩ abo Kaldia; eju-wñ muda adʼo n, o̩mo̩ i la aku.
Oñ omi afʼabo du ku ma donyʼu ku ma te̩kʼowñ fiatuka ñw afu du, kpʼabʼudala-wñ udala-wñ chaka; tak u nawʼo̩kwo̩chageli tʼuma ubi.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, e̩gba kʼu fʼuma kwu rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi; kʼu la fʼuma fiatuka rʼojane̩ ojane̩.

Omi muda atʼaboke̩le̩ ma no̩ pe̩ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi ki we ekpa ma, kʼama kʼi du e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma du kpogo ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma wa le̩; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Anubi le̩ ge̩ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, jʼuje̩wñ-we̩ kpʼo̩la ega gogodo kʼe̩ la ñmʼomi-we̩ kpʼo̩la ega kpʼejiji eda;

kʼe̩ la ka ñw abo ane̩-i kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ugbo abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼojane̩ Israe̩l de̩ kakini, Ma ajʼuje̩-wñ-ma kpʼailo era, omi ku ma añmo̩ e̩do̩-ma ada kpu, todu kʼane̩-wñ ki te̩ ofo kʼe̩wñ du ki we edʼef uwñ, tod e̩wñ afuma kʼabo ku ma gugu oji-wñ ache.
Ewo ewo kʼone̩ dodo ef uwñ le̩ achihi rinyo̩, oñ ane̩ le̩ umud alache̩ te̩; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩wñ chʼita ku me̩ kpa ane̩ Israe̩l kakini, Iko-wñ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, ane̩ ego du lenyo̩ rʼile̩ me̩?

Todule̩ e̩ naka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Nache ku ma we ekpʼita-i. Ma ñʼadʼe-le̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ ane̩ Israe̩l ge̩ n; e̩ ki muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Iko-wñ me̩rʼo̩wo̩, kpai o̩la ane̩ ego chaka eche̩.
Todu ane̩ ego e-olemi kpʼifa ebo kpʼurinyo̩ o̩fa eka ñʼade̩ ef unyi abo Israe̩l ge̩ n.
Todu omi Jihofa de̩. O̩la kʼu naka, ma ache teju-wñ; ma ñʼabʼo̩jo̩ tʼo̩ ge̩ n. Todu iko e-we̩, O abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, omi akʼo̩la le̩, oñ na ño̩ che teju-wñ, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ go ta, abo unyi Israe̩l jʼaka kakini, Ane̩ ego kʼi ali le̩, o̩jo̩-wñ bo̩ tʼo̩gba nana ta; ache̩ kʼi aka le̩ iko-wñ dʼo̩gba o̩gba ta.
Todule̩ e̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, O̩la du kʼu ka ma ñʼabʼo̩jo̩ du tʼo̩ ge̩ n. O̩la kʼomi muda ka ma ache, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
